verses.verse: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> to bring to remembrance אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> [Make haste] O God לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> to deliver יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <S%H5833><s%> to help חֽוּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H2363><s%> me make haste

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּרוּ֮ <S%H2659><s%> and confounded מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <S%H1245><s%> that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> let them be turned אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> backward וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <S%H3637><s%> and put to confusion חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <S%H2655><s%> that desire רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> my hurt

יָ֭שׁוּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Let them be turned back עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> for a reward בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H1322><s%> of their shame הָ֝אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> that say הֶ֘אָ֥ח ׀ <S%H1889><s%> Aha הֶאָֽח׃ <S%H1889><s%> aha

יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> thee rejoice וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ ׀ <S%H8055><s%> and be glad בְּךָ֗ כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H1245><s%> Let all those that seek וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> say תָ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> be magnified אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> Let God אֹ֝הֲבֵ֗י <S%H157><s%> in thee and let such as love יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> thy salvation

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> But I [am] poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <S%H34><s%> and needy אֱלֹהִ֪ים <S%H430><s%> unto me O God חֽוּשָׁ֫ה־ <S%H2363><s%> make haste לִּ֥י עֶזְרִ֣י <S%H5828><s%> thou [art] my help וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <S%H6403><s%> and my deliverer אַ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּאַחַֽר׃ <S%H309><s%> make no tarrying
